entry.title: New BIP32 structure
entry.summary: In a discussion on 04/23/2014, Luke-Jr proposed that the scanning process for Bitcoin Improvement Proposal-defined (BIP) branches should include all possible branches, regardless of whether or not the supporting features are present. This suggestion was met with skepticism from Pavol Rusnak, who questioned if it was appropriate to show balances without allowing users to spend them. The conversation highlights the complexity of developing secure and user-friendly software for managing cryptocurrency accounts.
